comments:
Test case:

* Standard JUnit 3.8.1 project
* Breakpoint on line 28 of VectorTest.testCapacity()
* Debug to breakpoint
* Expand "this" in the var view
* Select "fFull" so its details show
* Hold down F6 for a while (I did it until 'i' was 16).

-> The details do not re-appear when F6 is released.

The following is in the log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.debug 4 120 Feb 10, 2003 09:59:33.623
!MESSAGE Internal error logged from JDI Debug: 
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui.JavaUISourceLocator.getSourceElement
(JavaUISourceLocator.java:143)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.JavaDetailFormattersManager.getJavaProject
(JavaDetailFormattersManager.java:163)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.JavaDetailFormattersManager.resolveFormatter
(JavaDetailFormattersManager.java:126)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.JavaDetailFormattersManager.access$0
(JavaDetailFormattersManager.java:121)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.JavaDetailFormattersManager$1.run
(JavaDetailFormattersManager.java:116)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.model.JDIThread$AsyncThread.run
(JDIThread.java:2396)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:512)
Looks like a "null" stack frame is being passed into the source locator.
